Flaming Gadgets
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher EVO Archive (PS2): Miscellaneous Q & A: Flaming Gadgets
By Ito Saith Webb on Friday, April 28, 2006 - 04:11 pm:

Just rescently I noticed that two of my gagets during a performence were on fire. One of the gadgets was the Knife Throw level 2. The second was a Bamboo Dance level 3. The props that I had added to those particular tricks had nothing to do with fire. On a side note these particular tricks did not start with this added effect. Has anyone experienced this or know what causes it?

By Apocalypse on Friday, April 28, 2006 - 07:35 pm:

I have experienced this with my level 2 Bamboo dance. I believe it has something ot do with the level of the gadget.

By Tinfoil on Saturday, April 29, 2006 - 08:15 pm:

Did you fail the minigame? Because when I failed fire shot out of my plate spin.

By Ito Saith Webb on Saturday, April 29, 2006 - 11:36 pm:

No I can honestly say that i have never failed one of the minigames, so that is not the answer.

By Blulightning on Sunday, April 30, 2006 - 12:28 pm:

Like Apocolypse said, I also believe it has something to do with the level...

the higher the level of the gadget, the more "dangerous" or challenging it gets for the monster, most likely the fire is just the only difficulty they could think of for the dance trick.
Although, I am not 100% sure on this.

By Penguin God on Sunday, April 30, 2006 - 07:08 pm:

That is true, your monsters performance experience and the level of Geonyte, s/m/l or 1/2/3, will determine what level the gadget is. At higher levels they become more difficult and neater.
